summary.para: Retrieves a handle to the synchronization object.

param.name: ph
param.para: A pointer to the variable that receives a handle to the synchronization object.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

remarks.para: Do not close the handle returned in the ph parameter. The lifetime of the handle is controlled by the object that implements the ISynchronizeHandle interface.

summary.para: Retrieves a handle associated with a synchronization object.
